description:
Create Multi-Service Docker Compose Development Environment

Set up a complete Docker-based development environment with all necessary services and databases for local development.

Requirements:
- Create a Dockerfile for the main application service
- Create a docker-compose.yml to orchestrate all services
- Include database services (identify from codebase: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, etc.)
- Configure volume mounts for data persistence across container restarts
- Set up networking between services with appropriate service names
- Include environment variable configuration for service connections
- Expose necessary ports for local access and debugging
- Add health checks for critical services
- Configure restart policies for development reliability
- Include any additional services (message queues, caching layers, search engines)
- Provide clear documentation on starting, stopping, and accessing services
- Ensure hot-reload capabilities for the application code during development

Edge cases to consider:
- Database initialization scripts and seed data
- Service startup order and dependencies
- Port conflicts with existing local services
- Platform-specific configurations (Windows, macOS, Linux)
title: Set up Docker Compose development environment with services
